line.originaltext: 1/4 cup cold margarine
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1/4 cup cold margarine")

line.originaltext: 1 cup all-purpose flour
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 cup all-purpose flour")

line.originaltext: 1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened")

line.originaltext: 2 tablespoons heat-stable granular sugar substitute
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "2 tablespoons heat-stable granular sugar substitute")

line.originaltext: 1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups cold skim milk
line.annotation: create_ing(ing5, "1 1/2 cups cold skim milk")

line.originaltext: 1 (1.4 ounce) package instant sugar-free chocolate pudding mix
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 (1.4 ounce) package instant sugar-free chocolate pudding mix")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, cut margarine into flour until crumbly.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "bowl")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, cut margarine into flour until crumbly.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1}, ing7, "margarine flour", "cut margarine into flour until crumbly")

line.originaltext: Press into an 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray.
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray")

line.originaltext: Press into an 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray.
line.annotation: do(ing7, t1, ing8, "crust", "press into dish")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned.
line.annotation: create_tool(t2, "oven")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned.
line.annotation: cook(ing8, t2, ing9, "baked crust", "bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned")

line.originaltext: Cool completely.
line.annotation: leave(ing9,"cool completely")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sweetener until smooth.
line.annotation: create_tool(t3, "mixing bowl")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sweetener until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing3}, ing10, "sweet cheese", "")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sweetener until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing10, t3, ing11, "smooth cheese", "beat until smooth")

line.originaltext: Fold in half of the whipped topping.
line.annotation: separate(ing4, ing12, "1/2 whipped topping", ing13, "1/2 whipped topping", "")

line.originaltext: Fold in half of the whipped topping.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12}, ing14, "cheese mix", "fold in")

line.originaltext: Carefully spread over the crust.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing9}, ing15, "first layer", "carefully spread over the crust")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, combine milk and pudding mix.
line.annotation: combine({ing5, ing6}, ing16, "milk and pudding", "")

line.originaltext: Beat on low speed for 2 minutes.
line.annotation: mix(ing16, t3, ing17, "beaten pudding", "beat on low speed for 2 minutes")

line.originaltext: Let stand for 2-3 minutes.
line.annotation: leave(ing17,"let stand for 2-3 minutes")

line.originaltext: Spread over the cream cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing17}, ing18, "pie", "spread over cream cheese")

line.originaltext: Top with the remaining whipped topping.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing18}, ing19, "pie", "top with whipped topping")
